name: Dinari ARKK
description: The Dinari ARKK dShares token (ARKK.d) represents 1:1 ownership of shares in the ARK Innovation ETF (ARKK), a fund focused on companies at the forefront of disruptive innovation in fields such as technology, genomics, robotics, and artificial intelligence. Each ARKK.d token is fully collateralized by a corresponding ARK Innovation ETF share held securely in a transparent and auditable treasury. By leveraging blockchain technology, ARKK.d provides investors with seamless access to ARK Innovation ETF shares, offering 24/7 trading, fractional ownership, instant settlements, and enhanced liquidity.
